```{r}
#| include: false
library(here)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(DT)

source(here("scripts/00_helpers.R"))
df <- read_csv(here("data/processed/submissions_cleaned.csv"), show_col_types = FALSE)
df <- df |> mutate(make_hyperlink(Website))
```

```{r}
datatable(
  df,
  filter = "top",
  rownames = FALSE,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 25,
    scrollX = TRUE
  ), 
  escape = FALSE
)
```
